TEXT: Spend that amount of #ySoul in order to play this card.

Increases [#696969]Void Level. Having [#696969]Void removes all #ySoul, prevents [#EFFAFF]Focus, and Increases #rdamage #rtaken from #renemies by #r50%. NL [#696969]Void increases the damage dealt by [#696969]Void [#60CFFF]Spells per stack. NL [#696969]Void goes down by #b1 at the beginning of each turn.
A lingering debuff, [#FFA200]Infection [#FFA200]Level damages you equal to the amount, and decrements by #b2 at the end of your turn.
Disable custom Enemies. (Must restart game, Zote Event Enemy will still be included.)
